shortdesc.ph: The transmission mode of data over multiple network paths.

plentry.pd: (0): Redundant transmission mode. Data is sent simultaneously over multiple paths to improve transmission reliability.
(1): Dynamic transmission mode. The SDK dynamically selects the optimal path for data transmission based on the current network conditions to improve transmission performance.
(1): Dynamic transmission mode. The SDK dynamically selects the optimal path for data transmission to improve transmission performance.
